```py
In [1]: vu = 1.5  

In [2]: vd = 3.75  ![2](Images/2.png)

In [3]: type(vu)  ![3](Images/3.png)
Out[3]: float

In [4]: vu + vd  ![4](Images/4.png)
Out[4]: 5.25
```

```py
In [5]: import numpy as np  ![1](Images/1.png)

In [6]: v = np.array((vu, vd))  ![2](Images/2.png)

In [7]: v  ![3](Images/3.png)
Out[7]: array([1.5 , 3.75])

In [8]: v.dtype  ![4](Images/4.png)
Out[8]: dtype('float64')

In [9]: v.shape  ![5](Images/5.png)
Out[9]: (2,)

In [10]: v + v  ![6](Images/6.png)
Out[10]: array([3. , 7.5])

In [11]: 3 * v  ![7](Images/7.png)
Out[11]: array([ 4.5 , 11.25])
```

```py
In [12]: S = np.array((20, 5))  ![1](Images/1.png)

In [13]: K = 15  ![2](Images/2.png)

In [14]: C = np.maximum(S - K, 0)  ![3](Images/3.png)

In [15]: C  ![4](Images/4.png)
Out[15]: array([5, 0])
```
